spec_data.Name: perl-CPAN-Inject
spec_data.Description:
Following the release of CPAN::Mini, the CPAN::Mini::Inject module was
created to add additional distributions into a minicpan mirror.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:08:16 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Base class for injecting distributions into CPAN sources
